name: SEER Regional Nodes
title: SEER Regional Nodes
notes: **Note:**  Nodal metastasis is very rare in gastrointestinal stromal tumors, and surgeons generally agree that nodal dissection is not indicated. In the absence of information on regional lymph node status, assume regional lymph nodes are negative.
